## AbstractLayoutComponentDirective interface

Type of the Layout metadata.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AbstractLayoutComponentDirective 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [layoutMode](./component-api.abstractlayoutcomponentdirective.layoutmode.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | An optional layout mode used with a default layout mapping. |
|  [mappingId](./component-api.abstractlayoutcomponentdirective.mappingid.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | ID of the content item, content type or the content type name used for a default layout mapping. If the ID is not given, this layout will not be mapped by default. |
|  [selector](./component-api.abstractlayoutcomponentdirective.selector.md) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | Defines the mapping between the layout controller to the layout implementation. If this property is missing, the selector of the component will be used instead. |
